alert.note: Alert for Clinton; Fayette; Greene; Highland (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 8:25PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SHOWER WITH GUSTY WINDS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHWESTERN FAYETTE, NORTHERN CLINTON, SOUTHEASTERN GREENE AND NORTH CENTRAL HIGHLAND COUNTIES THROUGH 900 PM EDT... At 824 PM EDT, a shower was located 7 miles north of Wilmington, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Washington Court House, Wilmington, Sabina, New Vienna, Staunton, Bowersville, Port William, Highland, Milledgeville, Paintersville, Melvin, Bloomington, Lumberton, Middleton Corner, New Antioch, Oakland, Jasper Mills, Lees Creek, Reesville and Kingman. This includes I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 46 and 62. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
